channel.title: CVE Feed for Iznyn -- Purity Of Soul

item.title: CVE-2024-43348|2024-08-18T13:15:21.494Z -- iznyn -- purity%20of%20soul
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Iznyn Purity Of Soul allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Purity Of Soul: from n/a through 1.9.
